item.title: ETHZilla has announced a plan to issue up to $10 billion in common stock to purchase more ETH.
item.description: On August 23rd, the US stock Ethereum reserve company ETHZilla (formerly 180 Life Sciences) announced that, in accordance with the amended and restated sales agreement with Clear Street LLC, the company intends to periodically issue and sell common stock through Clear Street as a sales agent. The maximum total amount to be raised is up to $10 billion.As of this announcement, the company has issued and sold 5,001,310 shares of common stock under the initial sales agreement, raising a total of approximately $34.4 million. Starting from the date of this prospectus supplement, the company will no longer sell common stock in accordance with the market issuance prospectus submitted on August 13, 2025.

item.title: This week, Bitdeer mined a total of 91.1 BTC, surpassing a total holding of 1800 BTC.
item.description: August 23rd. Bitdeer, a Bitcoin mining company, disclosed the latest Bitcoin holding data. By August 22nd, its total Bitcoin holdings had risen to 1,818.2 BTC (It should be noted that this quantity represents pure holdings and does not encompass Bitcoin deposited by customers). Furthermore, this week's Bitcoin mining output was 91.1 BTC, yet 37.0 BTC were sold.

item.title: Bitget has now launched WLFI pre-market trading and futures trading
item.description: On August 23rd, as per the official announcement, Bitget has now initiated pre-market trading and futures trading, with a leverage range spanning from 1 to 25 times.

item.title: Next Week Macro Outlook: July Core PCE on the Horizon, "Don't Get Too Excited About Rate Cuts"
item.description: August 23rd. For the majority of this month, Wall Street traders thronged to the stock and bond markets, wagering that the Fed was ultimately prepared to cut rates once again. The sole thing they were awaiting was the green light from Fed Chair Powell to sustain this rally. Their wish was fulfilled on Friday as Powell adopted a dovish stance in a highly anticipated speech, giving rise to the largest cross-market rally since April.On Friday, Powell hinted at the Fed's readiness to modify its policy direction, which brought to mind the situation at the Jackson Hole conference a year ago. In his Jackson Hole speech, Powell opened the door to a rate cut in September, clearly indicating that the Fed will reduce rates by 25 basis points at the September meeting.On Tuesday at 03:15, 2026 FOMC Voter and Dallas Fed President Logan participated in a panel discussion at the 100th Anniversary of the Bank of Mexico;On Tuesday at 07:15, FOMC Permanent Voter and NY Fed President Williams deliver

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Falls Below $115,000
item.description: On August 23rd, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin dropped below $115,000, and its 24-hour growth rate narrowed to 2.40%.

item.title: A Bitcoin whale is currently moving 1020 BTC to ETH, with 777 BTC still remaining to be converted.
item.description: On August 23rd, as per Mlm Monitor, a Bitcoin whale is currently in the process of converting 1,020 BTC ($118 million) into ETH. The address still retains 777 BTC ($89.5 million) on Hyperliquid, and this might potentially be the final batch of BTC to be converted to ETH.

item.title: DORA Drops Over 15% in 24 Hours, Market Cap Falls to $240 Million
item.description: On August 23rd, based on GMGN market data as shown in GMGN, DORA experienced a sharp decline of over 15% within 24 hours. Its market capitalization dropped to $240 million, and the current number of holders reached 92,300.Previously, Binance Alpha launched a new airdrop for DORA, with at least 200 points available for claiming.

item.title: OKX has launched WLFI (World Liberty Financial) pre-market trading.
item.description: August 23rd. As per official information, OKX initiated WLFI (World Liberty Financial) pre-trading at 9:00 PM on August 23rd, 2025 (UTC+8).

item.title: Binance Alpha New Airdrop DORA Launched, Minimum 200 Points Required for Claim
item.description: August 23rd. Binance Alpha's brand new airdrop, DORA, is now in effect. Users who possess at least 200 Binance Alpha points are eligible to claim a 140 DORA token airdrop on a first-come, first-served basis. In the event that the rewards are not completely distributed, the points threshold will automatically reduce by 15 points every hour.It should be noted that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Binance Alpha points. Users are required to confirm their claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be deemed forfeited.

item.title: BlackRock's Ethereum ETF Holding Surpasses $15 Billion in Value, with a 50% Increase in the Past Month
item.description: On August 23rd, based on official data, BlackRock's iShares Ethereum Trust ETF (ETHA) has attained a holding of 3.541277 million ETH. The holding value exceeds 15 billion US dollars, representing a 50% growth in the past month. Previously, on July 23rd earlier this year, BlackRock's Ethereum ETF's holding value had already exceeded 10 billion US dollars.
